q1: How do I convert km/h to mph?
a1: Divide km/h by 1.609. For example, 100 km/h â‰ˆ 62.14 mph.
a2: Mach 1 is the speed of sound, approximately 343 m/s or 1,235 km/h at sea level.
a3: A knot is one nautical mile per hour (1.852 km/h), used in aviation and maritime navigation.
a4: Meters/second, km/h, mph, knots, feet/second, and Mach number.
